title: The Challenge of the Lonely Sky
text:
The Challenge of the Lonely Sky is a <a href="Television%20in%20Canada">Canadian</a> documentary television miniseries which aired on <a href="CBC%20Television">CBC Television</a> in 1974.
Premise.
The series concerns Canadian civil aviation.
Scheduling.
This half-hour series was broadcast Tuesdays at 7:30 p.m. from 2 to 23 July 1974.
